data.title: Sivaji: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Sivaji: Check out the list of all Sivaji movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Sivaji news on Times of India.
data.text:
Not Tamil Nadu, Rajinikanth's 'Padayappa' re-released in theaters in the USA as it completes 25 years

etimes.in / Jul 01, 2024, 13:37 (IST)

Rajinikanth's classic 'Padayappa' re-released in the USA after 25 years, directed by KS Ravikumar, starring Soundarya and Ramya Krishnan. Fans share buzz on social media about Sivaji Ganesan's crucial role. The film's success at the box office exceeded Rs 50 crore. Upcoming films 'Vettaiyan' and 'Coolie' are in production.

Did you know Mohanlal said 'no' to playing the villain in Rajinikanth starrer 'Sivaji: The Boss'?

etimes.in / Jul 03, 2024, 23:06 (IST)

Mohanlal's refusal to play the antagonist role in 'Sivaji: The Boss' impacted the casting, leading to the inclusion of talented actors like Vivek, Manivannan, and Raghuvaran. Despite finding the character interesting, the actor prioritized his relationships in Kerala and Tamil Nadu over taking on the role.

S Shankar sets the record straight on sequels; says there are no plans yet for 'Sivaji 2,' 'Nayak 2,' or 'Aparichit 2'

etimes.in / Jul 02, 2024, 08:45 (IST)

Director S Shankar clarifies that despite fan interest, there are currently no plans for sequels to his acclaimed films 'Sivaji,' 'Nayak,' or 'Aparichit.' Emphasizing the importance of a compelling narrative over sequelizing for the sake of it, Shankar remains focused on the upcoming release of 'Hindustani 2' and future projects like 'Hindustani 3' and 'Game Changer.'

S Shankar reveals he wanted to create a cinematic universe combining 'Indian,' 'Nayak' and 'Sivaji'

etimes.in / Jun 29, 2024, 21:25 (IST)

Indian 2, directed by S Shankar and starring Senapathy, alongside Siddharth, SJ Suryah, and Rakul Preet Singh, promises an exhilarating cinematic experience with the potential for a broader universe expansion.

Did you know an old film starring Simbu and Aishwarya Rai was shelved?

etimes.in / Jun 29, 2024, 15:07 (IST)

KV Anand, a renowned filmmaker, known for directing hits like 'Ayan' and 'Kaappaan', passed away in 2021 due to a cardiac arrest. His contributions as a director and cinematographer, including 'Mudhalvan' and 'Sivaji The Boss', have left a lasting impact on Indian cinema.

Kamal Haasan recalls how he had 'almost in tears in his eyes' when he saw Dilip Kumar for the FIRST time

etimes.in / Jun 29, 2024, 14:07 (IST)

Veteran star Kamal Haasan who has created a niche in the Indian film industry with his stellar performances recalls how he almost had tears in his eyes when he saw Dilip Kumar for the first time.

When Rajinikanth jokingly thanked Aishwarya Rai Bachchan to star opposite him in 'Enthiran' - throwback

etimes.in / Jun 22, 2024, 15:11 (IST)

Rajinikanth, known for his legendary acting in the South, humorously recalls making fun of his pairing with Aishwarya Rai in 'Enthiran' during a stage speech.

Sathyaraj opens up for the first time to reveal that there is no feud between him and Rajinikanth

etimes.in / Jun 05, 2024, 13:19 (IST)

Actor Sathyaraj is set to collaborate with Rajinikanth for the film 'Coolie' directed by Lokesh Kanagaraj. The movie's music is composed by Anirudh Ravichander.

The man who once trumped NT Rama Rao as Krishna

TNN / May 13, 2024, 04:08 (IST)

P V Narasimha Bharathi, a talented Tamil actor from the Sourashtra community, was revered in the early days alongside MGR and Sivaji Ganesan. Despite his impactful contributions, his centenary year passed unnoticed, highlighting a sad neglect in his recognition.

3 more summer special trains

TNN / May 09, 2024, 22:19 (IST)

Railways to run special trains from Vishakhapatnam to various destinations with detailed schedules provided by Sandeep. The routes include Visakhapatnam-Chennai Egmore, Pune-Bhubaneswar, and Chhatrapati Sivaji Mumbai-Bhubaneswar during the summer season.

Rajinikanth mourns 'Baashha' producer RM Veerappan's demise, says 'I will not forget him in my lifetime'

etimes.in / Apr 10, 2024, 10:53 (IST)

Renowned RM Veerappan passed away at 97 due to age-related illnesses. Rajinikanth mourned his demise, praising his political acumen. Social media tributes poured in. Funeral to be held today evening.

Sathyaraj to reunite with Rajinikanth after 38 years in 'Thalaivar 171'

etimes.in / Apr 17, 2024, 12:10 (IST)

Rajinikanth's 'Thalaivar 171' cast includes Sathyaraj reuniting with him after 4 decades, Shruti Haasan, Vijay Sethupathi, Mohan, and a possible Shah Rukh Khan cameo. Title teaser out post Tamil Nadu elections.

Ashok Selvan, Vasanth Ravi, and Aishwarya Lekshmi team up for a triangular love story

etimes.in / Feb 09, 2024, 14:22 (IST)

Director Priya, who hasn't made a feature film in the last 16 years, is set to make her comeback with the romantic drama 'Pon Ondru Kanden'. The film stars Ashok Selvan, Aishwarya Lekshmi, and Vasanth Ravi.

Did you know Rajinikanth has Maharashtrian roots but has NOT worked in a single Marathi movie? - ETimes BFFS

etimes.in / Mar 10, 2024, 14:00 (IST)

Rajinikanth, a global sensation, embodies simplicity both on and off the screen. Hailing from Pune, Maharashtra, he has warmly embraced all aspects of South Indian culture. Guided by his elder brother, he emerged as a superstar with a rechristened name. He is married to Latha and they have two daughters.
